description.value: A creature subjected to Assassin's Blood makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 6 (1d12) Poison damage and has the Poisoned|XPHB condition for 24 hours. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

_srdData.name: Assassin's Blood
entries: A creature subjected to Assassin's Blood makes a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) Poison damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 24 hours. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.
